data: Tragi-Comedy of Court Intrigue | Spain | House of Austria | Philip the Third

“The Tragi-Comedy of Court Intrigue, which had ever found its principal theatre in Spain since the accession of the House of Austria to the throne, was represented with singular complication of incident and brilliancy of performance during the reign of Philip the Third.”
